description: Bob Kendrick is a High Elf Knight, who has 1 sibling(s), and was born in a guild and rasied by a Gaurdian. Bob Kendrick lives in the lower Isle of Zarkus, where he lives out his days as a Peasant. Bob Kendrick is still haunted by his childhood, when he was treated badly by his peers.

Reyda Eslinger lives in the lower Isle of Zarkus, where she lives out her days as a Peasant. Others saw her as being different or strange, and so she had few companions.

description: Dracyian Illfate is a Wood Elf Knight, who has 6 sibling(s), and was born in a Keep and rasied by a Temple. Dracyian Illfate lives in the upper Isle of Zenethia, where he lives out his days as a Peasant. Dracyian Illfate was exiled from others as a child for being strange. Other kids found him scary.

name: Bobby Webb
description: Bobby Webb is a High Elf Knight, who has 6 sibling(s), and was born in a Swamp and rasied by an Orphanage. Bobby Webb lives in the upper Isle of Zenaria, where he lives out his days as a Folk Hero. Everyone knew who he was, and he had friends everywhere he went.

Zorion Moses lives in the lower Isle of Zarkus, where he lives out his days as a Noble. Zorion Moses is still haunted by his childhood, when he was treated badly by his peers.

description: Yvanna Agnello is a High Elf Rogue, who has 4 sibling(s), and was born in their family Home and rasied by an Adoptive Family. Yvanna Agnello lives in the upper Isle of Zenaria, where she lives out her days as a Folk Hero. Yvanna Agnello grew up with the ambition of being a powerful wizard, hoping she could become more powerful than the rest of her peers.

description: Nariel Malfoy is a Human Wizard, who has 1 sibling(s), and was born in a laboratory and rasied by an Adoptive Family. Nariel Malfoy lives in the lower Isle of Zarkus, where she lives out her days as a Peasant. Nariel Malfoy spent most of her teenage years flirting and wooing many people. Locals would pay her to teach them how to do the same.

description: Yvanna Swiatek is a Wood Elf Wizard, who has 4 sibling(s), and was born Among people of a different race and rasied by a Single Mother. description: Dracyian Chanassard is a Orc Rogue, who has 4 sibling(s), and was born in a Tavern and rasied by a Gaurdian. Dracyian Chanassard lives in the upper Isle of Zenethia, where he lives out his days as a Noble. Dracyian Chanassard would often fish as a child and became quite good at it. In fact he was crowned the champion in a fishing tournament at the age of 13.

name: Kyra Desmith
description: Kyra Desmith is a Human Knight, who has 1 sibling(s), and was born in the streets and rasied by a Single Father. Kyra Desmith lives in the lower Isle of Zarkus, where she lives out her days as a Peasant. Kyra Desmith holds the record for most lobsters caught in 24 hours using a single net. The record being 200 lobsters caught in 24 hours.

Sulfu Rigby lives in the upper Isle of Zenaria, where he lives out his days as a Noble. Sulfu Rigby would spend week nights playing his lute at the local tavern in return for food and a room to stay in.
